div.p:
The thride day of the monethe of Jun the yer' of god / et cetera comperit Dauy moffate citenar' of saynt
androwis befor patrik badenache ane of the bailyeis of this burgh' with' his forspekaris thomas of fyfe
and gilbert of Kyntor as day peremptour' set til him and assignit til him be the bailyeis and p to bring certy
ficacione and sufficiande pruffis to prufe the contrak made betuix him and Johne' andirson' of the breile of a
sarpler' of skynnis and a pipe of wollin clathe and present to the saide bailye his certyficacione and prefe of the
actione and askyt at him fulfulling of law as afferit // the saide bailye ansuerit and saide that he walde be
avysit and consailyt with' the aldirman and the lafe of his falowys sen' that day was haly day and eftir as he thai
gafe consaile til him he and his falowis sulde do thar' to that afferyt thaim to do til him of law continuyt
the ansuer' til the avysment of his falowys but ony preiudice of the party

The sext day of the monethe of Junj the yer' of god et cetera lxxj yer' comperit Dauy moffat with his forspekaris
befor' expremyt in the tolbuthe befor' the aldirman patrik of badenache alexander blindsele and Johne' the Waus'
thre of the bailyeis of this burghe and askyt at thaim ansuer' deliuerans and finale ende of his certificacione
and pruffis that he deliueryt to thaim in write vndir autentik selys in the actione and contrak made til him be
Johne' andirson' of the breile of certan merchandis and gudis ressauit be him in his schip / the saide bailyeis withe
the avys' of the aldirman thar' beande present continuyt the ansuer' and deliuerans of the saide certificaciones til on the
morne' at ten' houris and than with the avis' of the best and worthiast of the toune' to gif and deliuer to the
saide Dauy moffat finale ende and determinacione of his certyficacionis in saferr' as thai ar' availe and to
do til him thar' eftir that law will but ony langar' delay

div.head: the vij day of Junij the yer' et cetera
div.p:
This is the deliuerance of the assis' that thai finde it doutwys' quhethir the maystir has optenit
his schip and his hale gudis or nocht fra Inglismen and quhill' that be prowin lachfully
and made gude thai finde the certyficacione of nane awaile /

Decimo quarto die mensis Junij anno Domini quo supra comparuit in Judicio coram balliuis in pretorio huius
burgi Ricardus de Kyntor filius Jacobi de Kyntor ac procurator prouidi viri Johannis de haws'
burgensis de rissillys litteratorie constitutus cum libera potestate substituenda vnum vel plures procuratorem aut
procuratores loco ipsius et ibidem in presencia dictorum balliuorum fecit constituit et ordinauit loco ipsius
Ricardum de Kintor Johannem Wormot et thomam simson' suos substitutos et procuratores dicti
Johannis magistri sui coniunctim et diuisim ad petendum prosequendum et recipiendum omnia et singula
debita de summis pecuniarum et mercandisarum dicto magistro suo debito per quoscumque infra istum burgum et ad
distringendum pro eisdem si necesse fuerit prout Jura volunt acquitancias et litteras quyteclamacionis
de suis receptis dandis et deliberandis nomine et ex parte dicti magistri sui // et generaliter omnia
alia et singula faciend' gerend' et excercend' et cetera cum ceteris clausulis procuratorij necessarijs
et oportunis et promisit de Rato /

The samyn day comperit in Jugement John the Waus' eldar Dauy the Waus' his son' and agnes the Waus'
his spous' and grauntyt thaim awande a hamburgh barell' of salmunde to gilbert moryson' the quhilk thai
oblis' thaim to pay him be Witsonday next folowande the date of this write but ony langar delay and
gif thai failye in the payment of the saide hamburgh barell' of salmunde at the saide day the saide gilbert sal
haf thair' half nettis fisching of the furdis for the next yer' for the saide hamburgh barell' of salmunde
and for the male of the saide watir payande to the bailyeis but ony interrupcione of thaim and ar' oblist be the
fathis of thair' bodijs to warande the saide watir' to the saide gilbert the yer' lxxj yer'

Eodem die Ricardus lamb adiudicatur in amerciamento curie pro iniusta perturbacione gilberti de Kyntor /
et emendabit sibi prout Jura volunt

Thomas Jamyson' adiudicatur in amerciamento curie pro iniusta perturbacione Robertj de buchan et
emendabit sibi prout Jura volunt /

Donaldus tailyour' adiudicatur in amerciamento curie pro iniusta detencione a magistro nauis de bonny
de vna barella de beir' et satisfaciet sibi precium eiusdem infra terminum Juris

Curia legalis huius burgi tenta per balliuos in pretorio eisudem vicesimo xvijo die mensis Junij anno
Domini et cetera lxxjo quo die sectis vocatis et curia affirmata absentes patent inferius //

Robertus alexandri super quem adam andirson' porrexit plegium pro iniusta detencione ab eodem de
sex libris vsualis monete scocie sepe vocatus ad sectam ipsius non comparuit tanquam secundo die huius
processus non comparuit tanquam secundo die huius processus et Ideo precipitur seriando testibus Roberto quhite
et Waltero smitht

Eodem die Willelmus de carnyquhing super quem thomas de fyff prelocutor mariote relicte
quondam Willelmi adamson' porrexit plegium pro iniusta detencione xij librarum grossorum xiij s' g' iiij g' vsualis
monete scocie flandrie sepe vocatus ad sectam ipsius non comparuit tanquam secundo die huius processus et
Ideo precipitur seriando quod capiat districtum de eo et cetera testibus gilberto de camera et thoma simson'

The samyn day the assise has ordanit alysone' giffarde the spous' of gilbert the Waus' to
prufe lachfully within xv dayis her' eftir befor' the bailyeis that the some' of vij merkis
that gilbert of chawmer claymis hir' is payit til him scho is quyt and failyeande that
scho prufe it nocht lauchfully within the said' xv dayis scho sal content and pay the saide gilbert
of chawmer the forsaide some' of vij merkis And thareftir gif the saide alysone' may pruff /
lachfully within yer' and day that the saide some' is payit til the saide gilbert he sal re
compens' the some' agayn to the saide alysone' but ony interrupcione or demawnde / the
saide parteis findande vthir' sickir' souerte for the some' befor' expremyt

Willelmus mar' in amerciamento curie per propriam confessionem pro iniusta perturbacione Roberti mernache et emendabit sibi
prout Jura volunt

Dauid holle adiudicatur in amerciamento pro iniusta recepcione trium salmonum a Johanne fechatis Juniore
et a thoma Jacobi et deliberabit eosdem dictis Johannis et thome infra terminum Juris et cetera

Robertus mernache adiudicatur in amerciamento curie pro Iniuriosis verbis prelocutis gustatoribus ceruisie / et cetera
et pro perturbacione Willelmi mor' et cetera

Robertus Walkar' adiudicatur in amerciamento curie pro iniusta perturbacione philippi de Drumbrek seriandi in excercisione
sui officij et emendabit sibi prout Jura volunt /

Alexander coupar adiudicatur in amerciamento curie pro iniusta perturbacione Isabelle clerk et emendabit parti lese
prout Jura volunt
Isabella clerk adiudicatur in amerciamento curie pro iniusta perturbacione alexander coupar et emendabit sibi prout Jura volunt

Johannes skynnar' adiudicatur in amerciamento curie pro iniusta perturbacione henrici skynnar' et emendabit sibi prout
Jura volunt /

Henricus skynnar' adiudicatur in amerciamento curie pro iniusta perturbacione Johannis skynnar' et emendabit
sibi prout Jura volunt

gilbertus moryson' adiudicatur in amerciamento curie pro iniusta porrexione plegij super matheo coupar'
et ipse quytus de suo clameo in futurum //

Clayis nauta adiudicatur in amerciamento curie pro iniusta perturbacione Andree famuli andree scherar'
in robustis verbis et emendabit sibi per visum proborum hominum

Jane nauta adiudicatur in amerciamento curie pro iniusta perturbacione et lesione andree predicti et emendabit
parti lese prout Jura volunt

Andreas vir andree scherar' adiudicatur in amerciamento curie pro iniusta perturbacione clayis naute et
emendabit sibi prout Jura volunt

Magnus Wormot comparens in Judicio coram preposito et balliuis huius burgi fecit constituit et ordanit
prouidos viros thomam de fyfe Johannem Wormot et robertum blindsele filium suos legittimos et indu
bitatos procuratores actores factores attornatos et deputatos speciales coniunctim et diuisim ad prosequendum
venerabilem virum religiosum abbatem de Der' de summa xiiij marcarum sibi debit' quod quadam naue empte ab
eo quam nauem dictus magnus arrestauit pro summa predicta et pro omnibus alijs causis ipsum tangen' seu
tangere valen' in futurum per quoscumque motos seu monendos coram quibuscumque Judicibus et cetera et promisit
de Rato cum ceteris clausulis procuratorij necessarijs et oportunis

The samyn day Wylle blinceyll a pone qwhome robart gyllespy strekyt a
borch in' the handis of phylpe of Dumbrek that he is wrangwysly wexit
and craywyt be gylbart of chawmer for tua hamburgh barrelis of salmonde acht be hyme
to the sayd gylbart the quhilk he drew hyme plege and aw to fre thar of
as he at drewe hyme borch oft callyt and nocht comperyt tyll his soyte
as the fryst day of prossess' witnes curia et edeo precipitur sergeande et cetera witnes
Duncan talyour and John symson'

Ricardus de hill adiudicatur in amerciamento curie pro iniusta porrectione plegij super Willelmo
Joffrayson' de iniusta detencione ab eo de xxti denariis quia quitus factus fuit per assisam

Walterus pyot adiudicatur in amerciamento curie pro iniusta perturbacione Dauid de hill' et emendabit
sibi prout Jura volunt /

The xxti day of Junij the yer' of god a thousande four' hundre sewinty and a yer' it is grauntyt
be the aldirman and bailyeis and hale consale of aberdene' to maystir Johne' of chawmer parson' of hoye
for the mortificacione of the annuale of mundynis pertenande to the hospitale the fredome' of the
erast burges and gilde quhilkis he will present til ws in part of contentacione of the saide mortificacione
fre of wyne and al vthir' chargis for his gud labouris and thankis done' and schawin in the saide
mortificacione and the saide maystir Johne' has constitut alexander of chawmer and androw scherar'
his procuraturis to present the saide burges in his absens and to ressaue the profitis thar'of

The xxti day of junij the yer' of god a thousande four' hundre sewinty and a yer' it was grauntyt be
the aldirman consaile and communite of aberdene' for resonable' and richt expedient caus' licens to maystir
Johne' of chawmer parsone' of hoye and maystir of saynt thomas hospitale of aberdene' to ramayne
in the kingis seruice or in ony vthir' place for the termys of fyve yeris next to cum without ony preiu
dice of the saide maystir Johne' in or to the saide hospitale to be done' til him be ws or our' successouris
in tym to cum patrownis to the saide hospitale and grauntis him lefe for the saide fyve yeris to deput
a sufficiande chaplayn to serue the saide hospitale ane or ma quhilkis we admyt at the will of the
saide maystir Johne' to be deput for the saide tym of fyve yeris

Curia legalis huius burgi tenta in pretorio per balliuos eiusdem vltimo die mensis Junij Anno
Domini quo supra et cetera

Morisus besat cepit legittime probare vt asseruit cum vno homine sufficienti in manu sua hodie
ad quindenam quod Johannes Wormot debet sibi vj s' pro mercandisis hoc probato dictus Johannes tenetur
satisfacere sibi dicto vj s' infra terminum Juris et si deficere contingat in dicta probacione ad dictum diem dictus Johan
nes erit quitus de suo clameo /

Symon nauta posuit se in voluntate balliuorum pro iniusta perturbacione Johannis patrikson'
et emendabit sibi prout Jura volunt

Johannes patrikson' adiudicatur in amerciamento curie pro iniusta perturbacione symonis naute et emendabit
sibi prout Jura volunt /

The samyn day Johne' browne is chargit be the bailyeis to bring sufficiande certyficacione
that his wyf has Juntfeftment in the croftis of vmquhill Androw marr' vmquhile hir'
husbandis this day xv dayis and in the meyne tym the malis of the saide croftis to ramayn
vndir the arrest quhill that be schawin

Alexander coupar adiudicatur per assisam in amerciamento curie pro iniusta perturbacione cristini et emendabit
parti lese per visum proborum hominum /

Eodem die Robertus alexandri super quem adam andirson' porrexit plegium pro iiustainiusta per detencione
ab eodem de sex libris vt supra sepe vocatus ad sectam ipsius non comparuit tanquam tercio die huius pro
cessus et ideo precipitur seriando et cetera testibus Roberto et Waltero smytht

Eodem die alysone giffarde sponsa gilberti Waus' adiudicatur in amerciamento curie pro inusta iniusta detencione a
gilberto de camera de septem marcis vsualis monete scocie quod defecit in sua legittima probacione
sibi assignato per assisam et ad satisfaciendum sibi de dicta summa infra terminum Juris

Eodem die Willelmus de carnyquhing super quem thomas de fyfe prelocutor mariote relicte
quondam Willelmi adamson' pro iniusta detencione ab ea de xij li' grossorum s' g' et iiij g'
monete flandrie sepe vocatus ad sectam ipsius non comparuit tanquam tercio die processus et ideo
precipitur seriando et cetera testibus thoma prat et Willelmo de Rattre Johanne Wormot

Andreas fithlar' per confessionem propriam in amerciamento curie pro iniusta perturbacione et lesione vxoris
Duncani harpar' et emendabit sibi prout Jura volunt

Andreas baxtar adiudicatur in amerciamento curie pro iniusta perturbacione Johannis serui magistri Willelmi
vmfrason' et emendabit ei prout Jura volunt

Agnes baxtar adiudicatur in amerciamento curie pro iniusta perturbacione dicti serui et emendabit sibi prout
Jura volunt /

Johannes baxtar adiudicatur in amerciamento curie pro iniusta perturbacione eciam dicti serui et emendabit ei
prout Jura volunt /

Andreas aldane adiudicatur in amerciamento curie pro iniusta perturbacione vxoris thome oge et emendabit
parti lese per visum proborum hominum /

xijo die mensis Julij anno Domini quo supra Willelmus club pistor comparens in Judicio coram balliuis
et publice fatebatur se debere vnam barellam salmonum mensure hamburgensis Ade litstar' et balliui
ordinauerunt dictum Willelmum ad satisfaciendum dictam barellam salmonum prefato Ade infra terminum Juris

The samyn day Will blindsele apon' quhom Robert gillespy strekit a borche in the handis of philp
of Drumbrek that he is wrangwisly vexit and cravit be gilbert of chawmer for him for twa hamburgh barrelis
of salmunde acht be him to the saide gilbert for the quhilkis he drew him pleg' and aw to fre him
tharof as he that drew him borche oftymys callit and nocht comperit til his soyt as the secunde day et cetera
of process' et cetera witnes Duncane tailyouris and Johne' symson' et cetera

Curia legalis huius burgi tenta per balliuos in pretorio eiusdem decimo quinto die mensis
Julij anno Domini et cetera lxxjo

Eodem die actio mota inter adam andirson' ex vna et Robertum alexandri ex parte altera continuatur
in spe bone concordie per amicos et si dicti amici faciunt ipsos concordire in actione predicta
sufficit et si non faciunt ipsos concordare dictus Robertus comparebit coram balliuis super premissionem
octo dierum et respondebit dicto ade tanquam ad diem peremptoriam prout in eodem statu quo nunc est sine
vlteriore dilacione

Alexander hochouson' super quem Andreas de Rattre porrexit plegium pro iniusta perturbacione ipsius
et pro iniusta detencione ab eodem de suis piscibus sepe vocatus ad sectam ipsius non comparuit tanquam
primo die huius processus et ideo precipitur seriando et cetera fergusio blithnes et Johanne clerk

Eodem die Johannes Wormot porrexit plegium in manibus philippi de Drumbrek vnius
seriandorum huius burgi super Willelmo vokat pro iniusta detencione ab eodem de vna barella
salmonum mensure hamburgensis Idem Willelmus pecijt diem legalem ad respondendum dicto
plegio et balliui assignauerunt hodie ad quindenam ad respondendum dicto plegio et cetera

Eciam dictus Johannes Wormot porrexit plegium in manibus dicti seriandj super Johanne
Waus' seriando pro iniusta detencione ab eodem de vna barella salmonum eiusdem mensure
et consimili modo pecijt diem legalem ad respondendum dicto plegio et cetera

Andreas cumyn in amerciamento curie pro iniusta detencione xvj s' a Johanne tailyour' et satisfaciet
ei infra terminum Juris

Johannes Wormot amerciamento curie pro iniusta perturbacione curie et dedit thomam alanson' plegium
legalem pro se quod Willelmus vokat erit indempnis de se aliter quam per viam Juris

Willelmus vokat in amerciamento curie pro iniusta perturbacione curie et dedit Robertum gillespy plegium
legalem pro se quod Johannes Wormot erit indempnis de se aliter quam per viam Juris

thomas broysour' adiudicatur in amerciamento curie pro iniusta perturbacione alexandri fraser et emendabit
sibi prout Jura volunt et dictus alexander et vxor eius quiti facti sunt de omni perturbacione
ipsius thome broysour' et hoc sub plegio legali existente

Adam litstar' adiudicatur in amerciamento curie pro iniusta detencione ab Alexandro Wodman de duabus vlnis
albi panni et satisfaciet sibi infra terminum Juris

Johannes scot adiudicatur in amerciamento curie pro iniusta detencione vnius Iumenti ab alexandro Kowtis
et deliberabit dictum Iumentum dicto alexandro infra terminum Juris et dedit Willelmum de Rattre
plegium pro deliberacione dicti Iumentj infra mensem vel precij ipsius /

The samyn day William blindsele oftymis callit and nocht comperit to the soyt of Robert gillespy as
forsaid' is as the thride day of this process' et ideo precipitur seriando et cetera witnes Duncane
tailyour' and Johne' symson' his man

Alexander fraser dedit thomam simson' plegium legalem pro se quod thomas broysour' erit indempnis
de se aliter quam per viam Juris et consimili modo dedit dictum thomam simson' plegium legalem pro se quod Willelmus
cadyow erit indempnis de se aliter quam per viam Juris
thomas broysour' dedit

xvjto die mensis Julij Johannes ledale adiudicatur in amerciamento curie pro iniusta perturbacione alexandri fraser
et emendabit sibi prout Jura volunt et dictus alexander factus fuit quitus de omni perturbacione dicti
Johannis per bonam assisam /

The saide day Johne' pyot was accusit be the bailyeis for the wrangwis' withhaldin of v li' fra
Wat pyot quhilk he come borch' til him for ane callit nicholl childe and the saide Johne' has denyit
and the saide Wat has vndirtane to prefe the saide borowgang on friday next her' eftir peremptourly

Curia legalis huius burgi tenta per balliuos in pretorio eiusdem xxixo die mensis Julij anno Domini
et cetera lxxjo quo die secta vocata et curia affirmata absentes patent inferius

Eodem die antone' scissor in amerciamento curie per propriam confessionem pro iniusta perturbacione vxoris Willelmi cryne
et nutricis eius et emendabit parti lese prout Jura volunt

The actione' movit betuix Willam of carnyquhing and marione' the spous' of vmquhile Willam
adamson' burges of this burgh' is submyttyt to the decisione' of thir' personis vndir writtyn that is
to say to androw alanson' aldirman Richarde of Kyntor gilbert of Kyntor Willam of Rattre Wat morison'
Will of Kantle Dauid of hill Dauid simson' alexander blindsele William malyson' Adam of craufurd' within
viij dayis eftir that copin symundson' cummys her' and failyeande as god forbeide that copin symunde
son' cummys nocht the forsaide personis sal set and ende the saide actione on the law day of michalmes'
but ony langar' delay and the forsaide parteis ar' oblist til vndirly the sentens of thaim vnreuocabilly
be the fathe of thar' bodijs and failyeande of ony of the forsaide personnis til cheis' sic like personnis in thair'
stede til ende finaly the saide actione /

Dauid holle adiudicatur in amerciamento curie pro iniusta perturbacione seruorum Johannis stewinson' Johannis nory et andree mair'
et emendabit parti lese prout Jura volunt et dedit WillelmiWillelmum lutar' plegium legalem pro se quod Johannes nory
erit indempnes de se et cetera

Margareta myll' et Joneta Wenton' adiudicatur in amerciamento curie pro iniusta perturbacione seruorum dicti Johannis
stewinson' et andree mair' et emendabit parti lese prout Jura volunt

Johannes nory dedit Willelmi Willelmum de Kintor plegium legalem pro se quod Dauid holly erit indempnis de se aliter
quam per viam Juris

Johannes crukschank adiudicatur in amerciamento curie pro iniusta clausura vnius hostij de le tufall
morisij et patricij besat Jacente in vico inferiori ecclesie et cetera et quod aperiet dictum hostium de le tufall in continente
ad vsum dictorum morisij et patricij in futurum sine vlteriori dilacione /

Alexander de marr' faber adiudicatur in amerciamento curie pro iniusta perturbacione alexandri de hill pelliparia et emendabit
sibi prout Jura volunt et dabit pro emenda altari sancti sanguinis vnam libram cere in Dominicam sequentum

Item dictus alexander de hill adiudicatur in amerciamento curie pro iniusta perturbacione alexandri de mar' et emendabit sibi prout
Jura volunt

Mariota mulier vicarij de Inuervgy adiudicatur in amerciamento curie pro iniusta perturbacione Katerine
famule dicti vicarij et eodem filia dicte mariote in amerciamento curie pro iniusta perturbacione predicte
Katerine et emendabunt ei prout Jura volunt

Katerina predicta adiudicatur in amerciamento curie pro iniusta perturbacione predicte mariote et emendabit
ei prout Jura volunt /

Johannes chapman adiudicatur per confessionem propriam in amerciamento curie pro iniusta perturbacione vnius
puelle et emendabit sibi per visum proborum hominum /

Nicholayus baxtar adiudicatur in amerciamento curie pro iniusta detencione vnius lecti plumej cum le bowstar'
dimidii vnius vnius dimidij de et dimidij vnius albia Waltero cowpar
magistro nauis de le firr' et ad deliberandum prescripto dicto Waltero incontinens sine dilacione /

Eciam dictus nicholayus adiudicatur in amerciamento curie pro iniusta porrectione plegij super dicto Waltero
pro diuersis causis et denariatis ab eo tis vt asseruit et dictus Walterus per Juratam
assisam quitus factus fuit de omnibus et ssionibus dicti nicholaij vsque ad diem con
fectionis presentis scriptj videlicet nono die mensis augusti de anno Domini et cetera lxxjo

Robertus louson' carnifex adiudicatur in amerciamento curie pro fractione precij et communis statuti in vendicione
carnenscarnis et pro dispercionacione appreciatorum in verbis maliciosis

Eciam Johannes lammynton et alexander findelayson' quilibet eorum adiudicatur in amerciamento curie pro causa
supradicta et si contingat aliquem predictorum talem transgressum committere alicui satisfaciet pro forisfacto
preposito et balliuis xlta s' sine remissione

Andreas lammyntone adiudicatur in amerciamento curie per confessionem propriam pro dispersonacione patricij bade
nache balliui in suo officio excercendo et si de cetero talia fecerit alicui balliuo soluet preposito et
balliuis pro forisfacto xlta s' sine remissione aliquali

Duncanus de lammynton et alexander scherar' quilibet eorum adiudicatur in amerciamento curie pro fractione
communis statuti in vendicione carnium et cetera

Duodecimo die mensis septembris anno Domini quo supra comparuit coram balliuis cristinus de abirdoure
et fatebatur se debere Roberto Wormot vnam barellam salmonum et tres salmones cum vna vasta ba
rella propter hoc munittum fuit sibi per balliuos ad satisfaciendum sibi infra xv dies post et immediati
sequenti datam presentis scripti et super hoc dedit Johannem gregorij plegium et debitorem

Gelice nauta adiudicatur in amerciamento curie pro iniusta detencione ab alexandro de camera de ij s' j d'
sibi debitis et ad satisfaciendum eidem infra terminum Juris

Thomas Waus' porrexit plegium in manibus Duncani de straloch' vnius seriandorum dicti burgi super
alexandro de ailhous' quod ipse tenetur warandisare et conseruare eum indempnem penes vendicionem vnius cocliaris argenti
sibi per eundem venditi et balliui assignauerunt dicto alexandro hodie ad quindenam ad portandum coram ballivis
suum warantum et cetera et dictus thomas Waus' constituit gilbertum Waus' suum procuratorem ad prosequendum
et defendendum suum plegium super dicto alexandro ut supra et dictus thomas promisit de Rato cum ceteris
clausulis procuratorij necessariis et oportunis

Decimo nono die mensis septembris anno Domini quo supra Johannes Waus' Junior comparens in iudicio
coram balliuis pro tribunalj sedentibus fecit constituit et ordinauit gilbertum Waus' et Robertum Wormot suos
procuratores coniunctim et diuisim ad prosequendum Jacobum de Kintor et cristinum de abirdour' pro certis salmo
nibus pro quibus deuenerunt sibi pleg' pro roberto de abirdour' et cetera

xxijo die mensis septembris anno Domini quo supra Robertus Wormot Willelmus blindsele Willelmus
mateland Willelmus lynton' et Johannes pennyr' ex mandato balliuorum magno Juramento interuenien'
appreciauerunt cimbam alexandri fraser districtam per copin symundson' et nautas ipsius quam habuerunt
in ly Rade cum naue sua vltimo viagio ad summam x s'

Eodem die thomas de turyne de leithe comparuit coram patricio badenache vno balliuorum huius
burgi et fecit constituit et ordinauit Robertum lyndesay le heralde et Willelmum giffarde burgensis
huius burgi suos procuratores coniunctim et diuisim ad petendum et recipiendum omnia et singula debita
sibi per quascumque personas infra dictum burgum vel extra et signanter ad petendum et recipiendum a
Dauid howyson' quinquaginta vnum solidos quos detinet in manu sua de summa viginti librarum quam
dimisi secum ad deliberandum Willelmo giffarde et promisit de rato cum ceteris clausulis procuratorij ne
cessariis et oportunis /

Eodem die Donaldus litstar' adiudicatur in amerciamento curie pro iniusta perturbacione patricij serui
Ade litstar' per confessionem propriam et emendabit parti lese prout Jura volunt /

Cristy litstar' comperit befor' the aldirman and bailyeis in Jugement complenyeande in his gude
modir and hir' spous' torry lethe as he allegit he hade done' oftymys of befor' that he cuthe get
na nychburschip of thaim to the guding of thair' tak of the gardin throw the quhilkis he was
like to susten gret scathe and besoucht the aldirman and bailyeis of ramedie tharfor and
thai chargit the saide cristy gif it was swa that he sulde gude furth the hale tak and bruke
it hale til his awin oys' sen' thai walde sinde him na nichburschip bot gif thai wele
and thankfully content and pay him for his guding in do tyne
